name: Big Woodchip
description: You woke up in a small wooden Hell (Woodchip, from abysped2), managed to fight your way to a teleporter that took you to the surface, but pitted you against a wormhole in a wooden fortification (Woodchip Woodchip, from abysped3). After defeating everything that through at you, the only way forwards was a small dark cave. You wander for what feels like an eternity, following the wall with your hand, and eventually see a light at the end of the tunnel. But it's flickering and, sure enough, it's a torch next to another banded wooden door with a lion motif. You've recovered from your previous battles, but you've lost your plasma rifle somewhere on the way and you can't go back, so you grip your pistol. The only way is through...
